items.sentence: Tom hopes to inherit a lot of money when his mother passes away.
Tom reinstalled the software that had accidentally been deleted.
Tom said he knew where Mary had hidden the money she had stolen.
Tom seems to turn into a different person when he speaks French.
Tom needed to be paid something, so I gave him everything I had.
Tom started asking questions as soon as he walked into the room.
Tom died of heart failure on October twentieth at the age of 93.
I could tell you things about Tom that you probably don\'t know.
I didn\'t know how to do it, but I was willing to give it a try.
I didn\'t know that Tom was the one who was supposed to do that.
I didn\'t know whether Tom would be permitted to do that or not.
Tom looked out the window at the ship that was coming into port.
Tom loved singing. However, no one wanted to listen to him sing.
It never occurred to me that Tom might not be telling the truth.
You don\'t actually think I\'m going to let you do that, do you?
Even though Tom is quite ugly, Mary still fell in love with him.
Everywhere you look you can see damage caused by the earthquake.
Tom certainly spends too much money buying things he never uses.
Tom checked his rearview mirror before pulling out into traffic.
Tom closed his eyes and leaned against the side of the elevator.
